DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the optimal site for application of local anesthetics in total knee arthroplasty surgery. The hypothesis is, that improved pain relief is obtained when administering local anesthetics in the tissues sourrounding the knee joint compared to the knee joint itself.
DOC.brief_title: Intra- Versus Extraarticular Injection of Ropivacaine in Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: eligible for elective total knee arthroplasty able to speak and understand Danish able to give informed consent alocohol or medical abuse allergies to local anesthetics age < 18 yrs. intolerance to opioids
